text: Today on the West Coast, it's a quiet scene with 1 ft @ 8s WNW and fresh 11 mph NW winds—definitely not producing. Tomorrow, the swell picks up to 6 ft @ 7s, but with strong 28 mph NW winds, it’ll be blown out. The day after stays similar with 6 ft @ 7s and 28 mph NNW winds, still messy. Best: none.
